applicationError.title: Application Crashed!
applicationError.message: Application crashed due to an error. Please contact us if the problem persists.

home.title: Managing translation files made easy!
home.lead: Load your original translation file and easily edit each key before downloading. Only json files are supported.

uploader.referenceText: Load the source file which will then be used to generate a new translation file or fill the gaps of an existing one.
